metadata.title: CVE-2018-14553 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: gdImageClone in gd.c in libgd 2.1.0-rc2 through 2.2.5 has a NULL pointer dereference allowing attackers to crash an application via a specific function call sequence. Only affects PHP when linked with an external libgd (not bundled).

notes.note: mdeslaur> php uses the system libgd2

criterions.comment: doxygen package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
libgd2 package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.5-5.2ubuntu1').
